perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS MLX owns, hosts, licenses, publishes and maintains an Internet service in Canada that includes, but is not limited to the "Sympatico" web site which includes inter alia, the HealthyWay web site on the World Wide Web (the "MLX Internet Services");

AND WHEREAS HCI owns, hosts, licenses, publishes and maintains a health services web site known as healthcentral.com on the World Wide Web (the "HCI Site);
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS MLX owns, hosts, licenses, publishes and maintains an Internet service in Canada that includes, but is not limited to the "Sympatico" web site which includes inter alia, the HealthyWay web site on the World Wide Web (the "MLX Internet Services");

AND WHEREAS HCI owns, hosts, licenses, publishes and maintains a health services web site known as healthcentral.com on the World Wide Web (the "HCI Platform);
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'HCI Site' to 'HCI Platform' introduces a conflicting definition. The term 'HCI Site' is originally explicitly defined, whereas 'HCI Platform' isn't, which creates ambiguity about what the agreement covers.

perturbation.original_text:
MLX will run [*] advertising banners, promoting the Co-Branded Site each month, which shall run throughout the Sympatico.ca Site.

MLX will promote the Co-Branded Site on the Sympatico.ca homepage in a frequent and timely fashion.
perturbation.changed_text:
MLX will run [*] advertising banners, promoting the Co-Branded Site each month, which shall run throughout the Sympatico.ca Platform.

MLX will promote the Co-Branded Site on the Sympatico.ca homepage in a frequent and timely fashion.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Sympatico.ca Site' to 'Sympatico.ca Platform'. The contract consistently refers to 'Sympatico web site', a change to 'Platform' is undefined, creating an enforcement issue of what platform constitutes

perturbation.original_text: In addition to the foregoing, HCI shall ensure that the Co-Branded Site is integrated into the Sympatico site-wide registry in order for users to have a single login access for all Sympatico.ca and Sympatico co-branded web sites.
perturbation.changed_text: In addition to the foregoing, HCI shall ensure that the Co-Branded Website is integrated into the Sympatico site-wide registry in order for users to have a single login access for all Sympatico.ca and Sympatico co-branded web pages.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Co-Branded Site' to 'Co-Branded Website' and 'web sites' to 'web pages'. This creates an issue with the existing definition in section 1(a).
